name: Earth Defence (MattAlmeida)
description:
First of all, I hope you enjoy or have enjoyed the game! And, please, leave a rate and a comment (be kind), feedback is aways good. This way I can improve this and the future games.

This game was submitted for the jam: "Finally Finishing Something Jam (FFSjam) 2020" It will be also available on Gamejolt (a week or two after the launch here). I made it on Unity.

This game was a breakthrought for me, I've learned a lot with it and the challenge of finishing it for the jam were a huge help. I started to work on the project a week before I discover the FFSjam and decide to join it. But things were going really slow until I jump in.

You can see my devlog and progress while doing the game on my Twitter account (link bellow) searching by the tag #FFSjam. Being direct you can see by this link: click-on-me.

Other stuff:

Follow me here on Itch.io and on Twitter to see what I'm doing (tweets about games in english and brazilian portuguese).

You can support me on Streamlabs.
